data.title: Person: Jemima Khan
data.meta_description: Person: Jemima Khan: A comprehensive series of articles on this topic
data.text:
Russell Brand is ready to have children, but girlfriend Jemima Khan isn't rushing into anything.

Actor Hugh Grant has become a father for the second time and announced the news on his Twitter account – but warned the press to leave his family “in peace”.

Hugh Grant has become a father for the second time.

High-profile supporters of Julian Assange will have to wait to find out if they will lose £140,000 of surety cash after the Australian sought political asylum.

Hollywood star Hugh Grant has spoken out in favour of gay marriage – but admitted that he is not one for tying the knot.

The Taliban have threatened to kill a Pakistani cricket star turned politician if he holds a planned march to their tribal stronghold along the Afghan border to protest over US drone attacks.

WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange last night applied for political asylum at the Ecuadorian Embassy in London after failing in his bid to avoid extradition to Sweden to face sex crime allegations.

Hugh Grant thinks he is "too old" to star in romantic comedies any more.

HUGH GRANT made false allegations that the Mail on Sunday hacked his phone on the basis of “thin” evidence, a lawyer for the paper’s publishers said.

THE Mail on Sunday newspaper last night “utterly refuted” a suggestion that it had hacked the phone of actor Hugh Grant.

Private detective Glenn Mulcaire tonight denied deleting messages from Milly Dowler’s phone as the murdered schoolgirl’s parents spoke of their agony over the hacking scandal.

Actor Hugh Grant has become a father for the first time after a woman with whom he had a brief affair gave birth to a baby girl.

ACTOR Hugh Grant and writer Jemima Khan must be shown police information which indicates their telephone messages might have been intercepted by a private investigator working for the press, a High Court judge has ruled.

Police were ordered by a High Court judge today to disclose information which could indicate that telephone messages sent and received by celebrities Hugh Grant and Jemima Khan were intercepted by a private investigator working for a newspaper.

Screen stars Hugh Grant and Oscar winner Colin Firth reignited their on-screen rivalry as they had a real-life battle over 'Bridget Jones' last night.

TV presenter Gabby Logan has spoken of her frustration over false rumours on Twitter about her private life.

HAS Twitter killed the superinjunction? If you are a celebrity watcher, the chances are that you can google information that this newspaper is legally prohibited from publishing — a situation that makes an ass of the law.

A TWITTER user has set up an account claiming to expose celebrities who have obtained injunctions to prevent reporting about their private lives.

Singer Pete Doherty was today warned he could face jail again after he pleaded guilty to possession of cocaine.

CELEBRITIES can now post online corrections to what they consider misinformation and slurs about their character.

WIKILEAKS founder Julian Assange, who rocked the US government by publishing thousands of secret diplomatic memos, must be extradited to Sweden to face sex crimes allegations, a British judge ruled yesterday.

Julian Assange fears he could be taken against his will to the United States and executed if he is extradited to Sweden, his legal team said today.

Widespread travel chaos caused by some of the severest winter weather for a century left Christmas commuter plans in tatters and swathes of the country paralysed in the UK today.

Swedish authorities come to the High Court in London today to try to block bail for WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange, pending extradition proceedings next year.

WIKILEAKS founder Julian Assange remained in a British jail last night after the Swedish authorities appealed against a decision to grant him bail.

WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange will make a fresh appeal to be granted bail when he returns to court today.

A BRITISH judge sent Julian Assange to jail yesterday, denying bail to the WikiLeaks founder who vowed to fight efforts to extradite him to Sweden in a sex-crimes investigation.

WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange was refused bail today as he vowed to fight attempts to extradite him to Sweden.

Rock star Pete Doherty will appear in court today charged with cocaine possession after detectives investigated the suspected overdose death of heiress Robin Whitehead.

Fans had assumed their Live 8 collaboration was their last hurrah, but Pink Floyd’s David Gilmour and Roger Waters have put their differences aside to perform on stage for charity once more.

Hugh Grant says he can’t get a girlfriend because of his golf obsession.

A DECADE after singling out the Spice Girls, a top US fashion critic has put just one of them — Victoria ‘Posh Spice’ Beckham — at the top of his 48th annual worst-dressed list.
